title: Thanks for finally buffing assasins
body:
The game is now much more fun for me as a mage player. It's fun facing Zed, Fizz or Talon every time, because you only have one ban.

It's fun to play perfectly and still face 2/0 Talon, because he outpushed me lvl 4 and roamed.

It's great time, being scared to stay in lane, because a shark can appear and Fizz can 100-0 me even through MR.

Seriously, this game never been as fun,

ADCs have fun, when they are getting 4 manned bottom. Top laners have fun, trying to TP bot only to arrive when the bot is dead. I have fun, when I spam ping my bot lane maniacally anytime Fizz one shots the wave and leaves, while I scrable to farm with my mana, only to see him 8 seconds later killing my other laners.

The game is perfect now. You try to ward, pay attention to your surroundings, hit every cs, harras the Assasin against you, build a 15 cs lead, you feel good about yourself... and then you recall, your bot lane doesnt reacts to pings and the Fizz has two kills now.

So much fun!

replies.body: Yes i love playing against overbuffed zed, fizz with DODGE E, katarina with milion dashes, kassadin with flash per 1 sec late game, random rengar oneshoting me from the bush, buffed talon that his dash has now higher range than most mages AA, random kayn from the wall oneshoting me, invisible shaco with his stupid passive dealing 3/4 of my hp, and invisible kha XD
{{summoner:21}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:7}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3361}} {{item:2055}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3027}} are not an option for you?

So lets start this
Barier is already nerfed and ignite deals more dmg than barier covers
Exhaust, Im glad i CAN SEE talon kha or shaco and CLICK exhaust on them before they oneshot me
Ignite is counter to heal
Banshee what? How it gonna help me against something beside fizz?
Ward on laning? Thank u now im gonna survive zed oneshot
Control? This item doesn show invisible champions like shaco
Zhonyia? Yes im gonna use this and then wait for the death, btw zhonyia has like 2 times longer cd than zed talon fizz ult, i wont even talk about KHA Q XD
Merc? What? They dont need cc to kill me and 30mrs or something wont save me
Same with tabi, thanks god 20armor gonna help me
Roa is good maybe on 2 champions now, this item is basically trash on most of mages
Thanks for buffing **_AD_** Assassins.

Let's not forget the soon to be nightmare that will be Hail of Blades, Stormrazer, and reworked IE...

Now every AD fighter will be a true damage assassin... With NO counter building OR counter playing!; since they will also be crazy fast...

RIP league, It's been real...

{{champion:164}} : "90% of complaints they have and "experience" is due to them being bad. Simple as that. Finally being able to 1v1 your opponent and actually outplay them again with benefits as soon as they target kill gold and solo rewards in the next patches. No wonder the entire bronze and silver mage section of the boards scream in terror."

https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png 

#WHAT WILL MAGES BITCH ABOUT NEXT? WILL THEY EVER STOP? FIND OUT NEXT TIME ON DRAGON BALL Z

https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png https://i.imgur.com/uRlxP7s.png 

The constant? Every single major change thus far has seen mages whining and bitching about one thing or another on these here Boards. Be it about assassins or ADCs. They were bitching during the AP changes, saying they're not good enough. They were bitching when assassins were compensated, saying they'll be too oppressive. They were bitching when Conqueror started to become popular on Yasuo, spewing the same shit they always do of "no counterplay". They were bitching during the Mana Changes, saying they'll get pushed in too easily by assassins. Finally, now during the Marksmen Changes. They're not bitching about the actual Marksmen. Nonononononono, they're bitching about the assassins.

Never once have mages been an actual gutter class for the past season or so, LIKE ASSASSINS.

Never once have mages been so genuinely bad and useless that playing them in a game would increase the chances of losing that game, like ASSASSINS.

Never once have mages NOT been dominant in pro play, LIKE ASSASSINS.

Never once have mages NOT been overall decent picks in both SoloQ and Pro Play, LIKE ASSASSINS.
Maybe because Assassins are a living hell to play against when strong, especially AD Assassins?
While i may not fully agree with you, your formatting is fucking gold.
Thank you, my good fellow.

The true constant is that whenever one class sees some change as negative they say Riot has no idea what they're doing and are idiots but as soon as they get something they want the shut up and then another class comes in to say Riot doesn't know what they're doing. Everyone is always about me, me, me, me, me, me! If it's not helping them in particular then it must mean Riot can't even tie their shoe laces and are anti-christ Co.. 

Also you forgot to have a support there for their reactions.

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=00070003,timestamp=2018-05-08T05:27:52.598+0000)
>

Everyone is always about me, me, me, me, me, me! If it's not helping them in particular then it must mean Riot can't even tie their shoe laces and are anti-christ Co.. 
> 
> Also you forgot to have a support there for their reactions.

I wasn't going for specific roles. I was going for general classes. Supports generally fall under mage or tanks, which is why I didn't bother.

That is true. Keep in mind, mages have, historically, been the most dominant class next to ADCs, and yet they've been whining with each change this season. They weren't whining as much last season. However, when assassins had been in their worst state, they were throwing around "OP NO COUNTERPLAY", and when assassins were buffed (AD), they continued bitching. I have no respect for mages at this point. Maybe if they weren't bitching so hard during Pre-Season and literally EVERY fucking major change aside from reasonable ones like the Duskblade Comp Buffs and Mage Changes, I'd have a bit more respect for the class and its players. 

They don't know what it's like to be a gutter class. Mage players are fucking spoiled. When things don't go their way, they whine and bitch in hopes that Riot will bend over for them. They don't have to deal with the shit assassins have for the past two years.
This is a high quality post
Why thank you. Glad to see you here. I'm gonna make a few changes to it, but nothing too big.

Maybe because they are whining about it, is because they are EXPERIENCING what they are saying?

Ever think of that? No?

Then fucking play a mage in each of those situations then come back and try to trash talk mage players again.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-05-08T00:49:25.460+0000)

> Maybe because they are whining about it, is because they are EXPERIENCING what they are saying?
> 
> Ever think of that? No?
> 
> Then fucking play a mage in each of those situations then come back and try to trash talk mage players again.
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I don't need to trash talk mage players. They do the trash talking for themselves every time they bitch and whine.

Tell me about mages' experiences.

When have mages ever experienced being an actual troll pick?

When have mages ever experienced having the entire class in the gutter?

When have mages ever NOT experienced being dominant?

When have mages NEVER been a good pick?

I'll tell you when assassins experienced this.

Assassins have ALWAYS been overall bad picks. It's a proven fact that playing an assassin in a game means you're more likely to lose that game than if you played a mage.

Assassins have been dominant only once-- during S3, when they dominated both the comp and pro play scene.

Assassins have been in the gutter for all of S7 and for a bit of S8.

Assassins have been troll picks for the entire time that they've been in the gutter.

Assassins all experienced THIS. Where the fuck is your "try playing X" now? I heard no non-assassins defending them. You mages have already been dominant for so fucking long. As long as you're on top, you don't care about any other class. The moment things don't go your way, you cry about Riot not treating you fairly.
Don't forget how they can magically go to multiple lanes and still not be called "trolls". They're basically saints for replacing supports completely.
Well, I did do Zed ADC once... It worked.... until my team left me to die...

And you should try playing any Assassin against Annie, Vlad, Malz, or Morg.  Have fun staying under your turret during all of laning phase and missing half of the cs because they can poke you under turret without taking any damage.
I don't play assassins so I don't care. I lose half my CS just laning against them as a mage, and even get dived when I play safely under turret cause the turret doesn't protect at all.

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=0007000000020000,timestamp=2018-05-09T12:42:16.035+0000)

Play better then

I could've swore in the last one, tanks are actually *bitching* about rendering armor "useless".

But then again, mages were much louder in comparison.

Still, I liked how you picked the representative champs for each class. Especially mages...

> [{quoted}](name=MysteriousBootie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=00070008,timestamp=2018-05-09T18:46:37.143+0000)

Many thanks, my good fellow.

Don't forget that even if your other laners hide under tower, they'll die from a dive anyway because towers don't react fast enough to even be a threat, let alone do enough damage to endanger anyone except the support.

It's OK! You can waveclear late.
Oh.
Boards deserves nothing less with all their ADC bitching. Enjoy your assassin meta. You guys begged for it

Seriously, what happened? They went from complaining how assassins are literally useless and can't even kill the ADC 1v1 to complaining that assassins are OP and literally one-shot everyone at all points of the game with no counterplay.
Both sides can't be correct on this, so either one side is lying or it's nowhere even close to as extreme as they want you to believe.
That's pretty accurate xd, they will regret it for sure but will be funny
As a ADC/ Supp Main, I also will enjoy being the walking Cash bag again, but at the very least im not literally manhunted on the Boards so thats that

Now we wait for enchanter "nerfs" so assassins will be "even stronger"

Personally I'm not mad, but this will be another episode of entertainment.
We were here when the boards cried about how assassins are trash, just because high elo players couldn't make them work, while they were broken in lower elo.

{{item:3191}} {{item:3047}} 

There you go
Those two don't do shit against Zed, he just melts it like butter.

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2018-05-08T00:47:33.549+0000)
>
> Those two don't do shit against Zed, he just melts it like butter.

Can you show me that math?

I'd like to see it. Show me Zed's combo doing exactly the same amount of damage with 50% physical damage reduction.

<removed by moderation>

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DYWD9mOXcAY0rqm.jpg
I can tell you right now, even with Seeker's/Tabi's a full combo (WEQQ) is 50% HP with electrocute. An all in with R and Ignite will absolutely 100-0 even with those items.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=0009000100000000,timestamp=2018-05-08T08:27:28.609+0000)
>
> I can tell you right now, even with Seeker's/Tabi's a full combo (WEQQ) is 50% HP with electrocute. An all in with R and Ignite will absolutely 100-0 even with those items.

Yes, if you stand completely still and get hit by a full combo from outside your wave (and let him walk into range for a double Q) it will hurt a bit. Here's a fun fact:

60+76+108+100=344+1.7 AP 
50% = 172+0.85 AP
90+.35 AP True damage 

262+1.2 AP, and you can easily have 60 AP by level 6 even building armor for 334 total.

Let's assume you do stand completely still outside your wave and are hit by both, with 40 bonus AD by 6

150+150+70+100=470+3.1 AD
50% = 235 + 1.55 AD
297 damage...oh, that's lower than Ahri's, isn't it? Weird. That's also 1/3rd of a character's health at this level, so you mathemetically couldn't do the other 60% of someone's health off a 25% increase...hm...

Okay well lets move the goal posts, Lux doesn't have any true damage!

70+150+51+70=341+1.7 AP
50% = 170+0.85 AP
221 magic damage with 60 AP, +40 or so physical from the autoattack.

So as you can see, doing 70 more damage than Lux in a trade clearly means Zed can kill you in 1 hit at level 6. Thanks for sharing.

Oh, and level 9 is 440+95+130=332+1.55 AD, you need at least 100 bonus AD to do half of Lux's unshielded health with a combo. Let's not forget that this combo does 128 less total damage if you're standing in a minion wave, or have someone in front of you, and has 600 range.

Hyperbole is fun, huh?

I'm not seeing electrocute anywhere in the calcs, which adds 100 + .5 bAD + .3 AP, which gives Zed an additional 120 damage? Or any minor runes he may have taken like Scorch? (not that I blame you for that one)

And in an all in, he'll also have 205 extra damage from ignite and his passive for 6% max HP magic damage.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=000900010000000000010000,timestamp=2018-05-08T20:36:48.604+0000)
>
> I'm not seeing electrocute anywhere in the calcs, which adds 100 + .5 bAD + .3 AP, which gives Zed an additional 120 damage? Or any minor runes he may have taken like Scorch? (not that I blame you for that one)
> 
> And in an all in, he'll also have 205 extra damage from ignite and his passive for 6% max HP magic damage.

It's literally right there, 150+150+70+**100**. The .5 AD bumps his scaling from 2.6 to 3.1. Did you read the post?

Ahri or Lux would also have ignite, so it doesn't matter, and his passive requires committing to a blink for autoattacks. This was a simple comparison of combos, without regard for lane sustain/minion aggro/multiple ranged autoattacks and other minor runes for boosts to hp/damage/pen/etc

Not to mention that he can't even proc his passive in this instance, because the combo doesn't drop you below 50%
Sorry, I didn't notice. I thought the 120 Electrocute damage was adaptive, dealing Physical damage for ADs which would be halved to 60.

> [{quoted}](name=Charles Barklius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-05-07T22:20:31.332+0000)
>
> {{item:3191}} {{item:3047}} 
> 
> There you go

Have you ever played against champs like talon ,zed ,kha?? those 2 items are just waste of slots.

> [{quoted}](name=CppL,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=00090004,timestamp=2018-05-09T06:40:25.557+0000)
>
> Have you ever played against champs like talon ,zed ,kha?? those 2 items are just waste of slots.

I literally showed mathematically on the previous page that Zed cannot kill you through 50% damage reduction, and is even worse off than some mids for damage comparatively

Your feelings are not facts, sorry

> [{quoted}](name=Charles Barklius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Q72Xu0OG,comment-id=000900040000,timestamp=2018-05-09T16:36:45.323+0000)
>
> I literally showed mathematically on the previous page that Zed cannot kill you through 50% damage reduction, and is even worse off than some mids for damage comparatively
> 
> Your feelings are not facts, sorry

How did you get 50% dmg reduction from those 2 items?

Tabi + fully stacked Seekers give 65 armor.  By the time you finish those two items you'll have at least 35 or more inherent armor and 100 armor gives you 50% reduced physical damage.  In addition, you get the reduced auto attack damage from Tabi.

Talon is the only assassin overperforming. Sorry Assassins can actually work now and Mid isnt 100% AP Mages at all times. Legit every single time anything that isnt a mage is viable mid everyone throws a bitch fit and cries and cries "Mages arent viable qq" even though its 100% complete bullshit

Its literally EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. 

"OMG CORKI MID! MAGES UNVIABLE QQ" "OMG LUCIAN MID! MAGES UNVIABLE QQ" "OMG TALON MID! MAGES UNVIABLE QQ"

So fucking sick of it
Because when other classes go to the only lane where Mages can reasonably go without trolling other being being relegated to being a Support, Mages get shoved out pretty fast.

Where else is Zed going to go? Where is Talon going to go? How about Katarina? Kassadin? Where is Fizz/Ekko going to go IF they want to play like an assassin? Please enlighten me. Don't say top lane because I would LOVE to lane against Zed top every day as a tank that can ignore him or as a fighter and just stat check him every time he ulted and tried to go for a kill. Argument works both ways it isn't JUST mages that are confined to one lane.

Yes and that's the power struggle for mid, but Assassins are much more popular than Mages when playable so it's nothing but Assassins in solo Q.

And I'd rather have the arguably healthier for the game, less frustrating class to reign supreme. Ideally to me, Assassins would be Jungle primaries and off role mid.
